description: Resident of Guam attended a "People for Peace" rally in Hagatna today. Tensions have soared in the past week as Trump warned North Korea it would face 'fire and fury' if it attacked the US.
maintext: Resident of Guam attended a "People for Peace" rally in Hagatna today. Tensions have soared in the past week as Trump warned North Korea it would face 'fire and fury' if it attacked the US.
title: Peace protests in Guam in light of amped up America-North Korea rhetoric
